title: The Heartbreak Pill
description: In the tradition of Sex and the City —this bright and funny debut novel from Emmy Award winner Anjanette Delgado is sure to help mend many a broken heart.Erika Luna is a thirty-something scientist living and working in Miami. When her marriage ends in divorce, Erika’s practical nature leads her down the strangest of paths. What is a scientist to do with a pain so deep it interferes with her breathing? Erica begins mixing potions and uses herself as a guinea pig as she tries to create a pill that will rid the world of heartbreak.
author: Anjanette Delgado
